short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle password fields to text fields so you can see what you've typed (or mistyped).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will find all password input fields on a page, and turn them into readable text fields. The icon can be clicked again to reverse the process.
